Traits.Name: Arkentech Power Armor
Traits.Description: Start combat with Vigor 1. Immune to blights, difficult, and dangerous terrain.

Traits.Name: Command Aura
Traits.Description: Allies in range 3 of the Imperial officer have +1 boon on attacks. Other Imperial units may gain bonuses while in any Command Aura (this trait, or a trait with the same name).
